General.Name: PetroVietnam Transportation Corp
General.Description: PetroVietnam Transportation Corporation provides maritime transportation services to the oil and gas industry in Vietnam and internationally. The company transports crude oil, gas, refined oil and chemical products, and coal. It also offers petroleum technical and logistic services including, port operation, wharfage, open storage, warehousing, and office leasing; tugboat; shipping agency; and vessel repair and maintenance services. In addition, the company engages in the handling of equipment, fuel, fresh water, and lubricants; and manpower supply of marine crew. PetroVietnam Transportation Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
